TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CopyFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseMoveCopyFolderType

Docs.summary: The class represents an operation to copy folders in an Exchange database.

remarks.para: The CopyFolder operation copies folders and all their contents while the content is maintained in the same structure. The copied folders will have new folder identifiers and change keys.

example.para: The following code example shows you how to copy two folders to a destination folder and then get the new folder identifiers.

Docs.summary: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.
